name: family-photo-organizer-desktop
description: Desktop wrapper for Family Photo Organizer

scripts.bundle:backend: ./env/bin/pyinstaller app_yolo.py --noconfirm --clean --onefile --name family-photo-server --distpath electron/backend --workpath .pyi-build --specpath . --collect-data face_recognition_models --collect-data ultralytics --collect-data sklearn --hidden-import sklearn.utils._cython_blas --hidden-import sklearn.neighbors._partition_nodes
scripts.build:dmg: npm run prepare:seed && npm run bundle:backend && electron-builder --mac dmg
scripts.build:dmg:universal: npm run prepare:seed && npm run bundle:backend && electron-builder --mac dmg --universal
